name: PixelPaint
description:
The year is 1998, drawing programs are all the rage, and people want more fun with their newfound creativity. Then they found PixelPaint, a fun, silly, free paint game that is constantly growing!

I'm slightly new to coding (with some experience with forms of BASIC), and I decided, after learning some in Java-Processing, to make a Freeroam Painter (more commonly known as "Paint Software")

I'm constantly working on it, and have much planned for it in the future! For now, enjoy and have fun! :D

➮➮Artwork by Squiddie➮➮
